Absolutely do not "clean the tang"!  The nakago doesn't have to be 
signed to give you information, but it does have to be "as found."

Bob

Bryane wrote:
> Thanks for all the help. I will post pics as soon as possible.  I 
> live on the east coast of North Carolina (Cape Lookout, Cape 
> Hatteras). Would anyone happen to know a reliable source nearby who 
> could look at it in hand.
>   Some one asked me if I could take the handle off.  I have and there 
> are no markings anywhere that "I" can see.  I haven't cleaned the 
> tang so there may be something  I'm not seeing.  Only light file 
> marks that have faded quite considerably if not gone altogether.  
> Thanks again for the help.
>
